Description.Text: The Marriott Marquis, is a modern, 49-story luxury property in Times Square and within three blocks of more than 30 theaters. In fact, the hotel even has a theater within its building. The Marriott Marquis is seven miles from LaGuardia Airport, 18 miles from JFK Airport and 17 miles from Newark International Airport. The New York Marriott Marquis Hotel in Times Square features first-class service with new rooms, a new high-speed elevator system and newly designed restaurants.
• Empire State Building. • Statue Of Liberty. • Apollo Theater. • Javits Center. • New York Public Library. • New York Stock Exchange. • NY Vietnam Veterans Memorial. • Central Park. • Carnegie Hall.
• 49 floors, 1888 rooms, 56 suites. • 54 meeting rooms , 100,000 sq ft of total meeting space. • 2 Concierge Levels.
• Shops Nearby. • Restaurant / Bar. • Fitness Center. • Beauty Saloon.
• From La Guardia Airport:- Distance is 7 miles Go up to 42nd Street to 8th Ave, Turn right on 46th St to the hotel.
Restaurant:- • Starbuck's Coffee. • Broadway Lounge. • Katen Sushi Bar.

RoomType.text: Double or Twin PREMIER KING BED
